title: Invincible Romance
I Won’t Regret My Second Life, The Happy Ending Comes After Revenge
summary: The husband she loved, the only friend she trusted. But at the brink of death, Sereniel realized the truth: everything was a conspiracy woven with lies and betrayal. At that moment, love turned into hatred, and she vowed revenge. At the edge of despair, the one she reached out to was the duke feared as the “Emperor’s Dog”—Lexion Rosenbester—ruthless and merciless, known for crushing any who opposed imperial authority. The coldest and most dangerous man in the world. The conditions he set to aid her were only two: First, completely abandon that worthless man. And second—. Thus began the dangerous contract between the two. Yet, there is no hesitation. Sereniel’s second life had begun solely for revenge.

title: Lord of Mana
Marriage is with your brother
summary: A beautiful and successful news anchor, Yeojin's life looks perfect from the outside. But in reality, she's trapped in an unhappy marriage. Not only did her husband have an affair with her close coworker, but he also murdered her parents and stole their company. Yeojin thought her life was over, but when she opened her eyes, she found herself back on her wedding day. Watching her husband and his mistress flirt, Yeojin swears to get her revenge. She will do whatever it takes, even if she must marry her husband's older brother.

title: The Baby Isn’t Yours
summary:
Callia Taxicate was a mere commoner until she saved the life of Simon Tereloane, the son of a duke. In return, the duke helps make her commander of the emperor's knights and she becomes a war hero. 

Though she only sees Simon as a friend, the two unexpectedly spend the night together and she ends up pregnant! Terrified that he and his noble family won't accept a child out of wedlock, Callia runs away to raise the baby on her own. But how long can she hide this secret, especially from the father?!

title: The Demonic Cult Instructor Returns
summary:
The Central Plains fell to the invasion of the Demon Realm.

A martial artist, Sa Bigang, was ultimately dragged into that infernal world. After surviving the brink of death and enduring hell itself, he awakens ten years before the invasion ever began.

And now, Sa Bigang sets out to stop the Demon Realm’s return.

To do that, he must restore order to the murim and build the ultimate force: the Undefeatable Corps.

As the man who will rewrite the past and safeguard the future…

This time, he will never lose.

title: The Tutorial is Too Hard
summary:
Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: 

"Congratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World."

Intrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses Hell difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01% survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited.

This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.

title: Reincarnator
summary:
There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."  
  
Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"  
  
"Save Point."  
  
It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn, while training newbie adventurers. Loretta, who needs to become strong, will be trained by the innkeeper, Alexander.  
  
If you die, don't worry about it, just hit load!  
  
  
**TL;DR**:   
Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder  


---

**WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:   
<https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

title: Demon Lord’s Martial Arts Ascension
summary:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: The Villainous Admiral Wants to Catch Me in His Net
Overstepping Kiss
That’s Not What My Will Said
summary:
In a world where extraordinary powers called *" Beneïsons "* govern everything; only a boy named Kleis was granted the gift of the *" Seint Graal "*, a power whose use he could not even understand.

Despite this, he did not lose heart and formed a party with his childhood friend Hinoka, who possessed the beneïson of the *" Seint de l'Espee "*, to carry out guild missions. However, due to a minor misunderstanding and betrayal, his mind and body were shattered.

At the same time, Kleis' beneïson revealed its true potential. The *" Seint Graal "* was the pinnacle of power, capable of granting any beneïson in existence to himself or others.

Having lost everything, yet now holding the power to gain everything, what will he choose? The end of the world or something else?

title: Ancestor is beautiful and elegant
I refuse this kind of reliance
Office Worker in the Ice Age Apocalypse
Remember the Time-Limited Grand Duchess
A Revenge Guide for the Terminally Ill Maid
summary:
Framed for a crime she didn’t commit, Isabel died leaving behind her little daughter. 10 years later, she awakens in another woman’s body, with only one year left to live.

But the world she returns to is even crueler. Her daughter is now married to the very man who murdered her, all in the name of revenge.

With just one year, Isabel must find a way to save her daughter, no matter the cost.

title: Layer Upon Layer of Butterfly Reflections
I Want to Maintain My Stepmother’s Character
She Becomes Glamorous After The Engagement Annulment
I wish to annul the engagement
summary:
Collection of Mihara Mitsukazu's one-shots (2005):

- Ch. 1 - Slice of Black Chocolate (2001) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/wz4adqj?utm_source=mangadex)
> "Generally… a story about really cute guy trying to hook up with this really egotistic girl… although it's not really like that."

- Ch. 2 - The Vampire & I (2001) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/9023ktd?utm_source=mangadex)
> "A dark european ambient and the story of a vampire … just before dinner time."

- Ch. 3 - Children Can't Choose Their Parents (2000) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/eua0juz?utm_source=mangadex)
> "A haunting story about a man and his chicken. You will never look at an egg the same way again after reading this story!"

- Ch. 4 - Cut the Angel with a Scythe (2002) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/7xes9iy?utm_source=mangadex)
> "Angela is suffering from a terrible illness that keeps her confined… One day a magician comes to her window to visit… Will his magic change her fate?"

- Ch. 5 - The End in Common Ruin (2002) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/jmm0fja?utm_source=mangadex)
> "A story about two twins…"

- Ch. 6 - Deserted Place (2002) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/al2hlpo?utm_source=mangadex)
> "The story follows the journey of a mysterious boy who brings peace to deserted places and things…"

- Ch. 7 - Alice in Underground (2003) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/9kq7bop?utm_source=mangadex)
> "This short oneshot tells the adventures of Alice, but with a slightly darker tone."

title: Confessing My Love to Him, the Treacherous One
summary: When Natalie went back in time after her death, her only desire was for revenge. Instead, she accidentally confessed to the most dangerous man in the empire?! Natalie, the only daughter of the Count, was tricked by her stepmother and stepsister into marrying an abusive scumbag before dying tragically. After going back in time, she decided to turn her back against them and prepared to interfere with her stepsister’s love for the young master of the Duke’s mansion, Eli. But what she didn’t expect was for an accident to occur, and she ended up confessing to his uncle instead?! Help, this man is notorious for being difficult to deal with! Is it too late now to withdraw the confession?

title: God-level Assassin, I’m the Shadow
summary:
In a world where people sleep and enter the realm abandoned by God, Qin Feng, who had sacrificed everything for his sister, is betrayed by her.
However, fate grants him a second chance, sending him back nine years before the abandoned world appears.
This time, Qin Feng chooses to abandon his sister and focus on becoming the strongest.

(Source: MangaUpdates)

title: I have Max level luck
summary: The main character "Ryuya"  is told that he has no skills and is abandoned by his friends. The only way for him to compete with those possessing skills is to raise his level. After five years of training in the forest, he has raised his level to 8 million. Due to his excessively high level, he is beyond the reach of skilled humans, demons, or even gods.

title: Arrogant Regret
summary: After her noble family falls to ruin, Stella Embrose does whatever she can to make ends meet. But her departure from high society only sparks rumors about her supposed messy relationships with men. These false rumors reach the ears of Duke Callian Rochester, Stella’s unrequited first love and her husband-to-be under the emperor’s ploy to keep him in check. Believing Stella to be unworthy of him, Callian hands her a contract stating they will divorce in three years. Will this be enough time for Callian to be unblinded by his pride and see Stella for who she truly is?

title: Ministry of Strategy and Finance
summary:
Lee Seong-jun was always a good person. And with a smile on his face, he ran the country into the ground.

Wasting a 5,000 trillion won budget to chase approval ratings plunged South Korea into its second IMF crisis. His life as the president who ruined the country over, Lee Seong-jun finds himself 30 years in the past.

He returns to find a budget proposal — riddled with dirty tricks, corruption, and blatant self-interest — being pushed through the Ministry of Economy and Finance.

title: I will try to seduce the male lead for my brother
summary:
*I'll marry the male lead myself!*

Raffine is in a predicament, and there are three reasons why. One, she's been reincarnated into a super angsty, highly depressing novel. Two, her older brother is destined for death in said novel. And three, the only way to save him is by marrying the male lead. What the hell is going on?!

---
I possessed Raphine, the youngest sister of the second male lead, who had no dreams nor hopes, in an impoverished and obsession filled novel. That was also because he had a crush on the female lead, who married the male lead on a contract, and eventually died.

I can't believe it's such a miserable ending for my favorite character and kind eldest brother. No way!

Raphine decided to brainwash Prince Jerkan, the male lead of the novel, to prevent the female lead's contract marriage.

So that he can think of me when he needs a contract marriage!

"Jerkan! I want to marry you!"
"If you're grateful, you have to marry me next time."
"I need a simple marriage, so I'll get married through a contract."

And when the brainwashing finally succeeded, Raphine cheered inside.

"Okay. Definitely, I'll marry you."

I never imagined what kind of eyes he was had. Yeah, I really didn't know then. I didn't know this would happen.

"Didn't you pester me because you wanted to marry me?"
"Will you run away?"

title: Spring Breeze of the Wasteland
summary:
Set in the Soviet Union, the mysterious girl named Berka and the quiet boy Shchenok help a Socialist Party member to escape from the secret police. Their aim is to infiltrate into a certain mansion that holds what they seek, but the secret police immediately capture the two. Will they be able to find what they seek and endure the torture of the secret police?

---
- **Won the 18th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2014**

title: After Becoming Financially Free, They Offered Their Loyalty
summary: Shen Yuan, handsome and rich, became a second-generation loser and was mercilessly abandoned by his money-worshipping girlfriend after his family’s business shut down. However, because of this, he obtained the [Perfect Life] system. As long as he spent money on the opposite sex with a favorability of 60, he could receive double the amount back. From that moment on, he made full use of the system to win the hearts of beautiful women and earn a fortune. The more he spent, the richer he became. He spent money like water and rose to the top 0.1%, living a happy entrepreneurial life filled with endless passion

title: THE HEAVENLY DEMON LORD WHO DOESN’T WANT TO LEVEL UP
summary:
"Jin Yuseong, the absolute master of the Middle Kingdom, found life too boring. 'I must be crazy. Just unifying the martial world…'"
"'I should have just been a farmer.'"
"'No, I wish I wasn't born at all.'"
"In 'The Heavenly Demon Lord Who Doesn't Want to Level Up,' one day, he encounters a gate… And upon passing through it, a new world unfolds."
"Jin Yuseong, the top martial deity and leader of the Celestial Demon Cult, arrives in Korea.

title: The Returned C-Rank Tank Won’t Die!
summary: A C-rank tank, abandoned by her teammates to die, awakens a rare regenerative ability after enduring countless deaths. Now immortal but traumatized, she must decide her next move in a world that betrayed her.

title: Their Trap
summary: The unfortunate little Li Qian Luo accidentally married a man who happens to be a god tier wife defender. Welcome to how to get revenge on your ex-boyfriend!

title: Sweet Whispers
summary:
Oneshot promoting the first volume of the Light Novel "Alya, Who Sits Next to Me, Sometimes Whispers Sweet Nothings in Russian". Popularity may result in a serialization!  
  
Follow the story of the ice-cold perfect beauty, the half-Russian Alisa "Alya" Mikhailovna Kujo, and your average high school underachiever, Masachika Kuze. She has a cold exterior, but speaks her love in a language she thinks nobody understands… Little does she know that he understands her just fine! Enjoy the silly slice-of-life romance between Snow Princess and Mr. Worldwide!

title: The Delicate and Noble Concubine Has Lots of Tricks, and the Emperor Does Not Flirt With Her
summary: The self-disciplined and cold-faced emperor x the charming and seductive cannon fodder imperial concubine. The daughter of a billionaire group turned into a cannon fodder in a book. She wanted to survive, but unexpectedly she fell into the extreme favor of the cold-faced emperor, sinking step by step, and became the most favored concubine in the six palaces. Let's see how the charming imperial concubine won the palace fight and moved the emperor's heartstrings.

title: I Want To Be Fooled
summary:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.

title: Cry, Even Better If You Beg
The Player that can’t Level Up
summary:
When Kim Gigyu received his invitation to become a player (a unique-ability player, at that), he thought his struggles were over. But no matter how hard he tries, he just can’t seem to get past level 1!

After five years of working as a guide on the lower floors of the tower, he’s finally discovered his ability to link with “Egos” and raise his stats. As his new skills unlock adventures in unexplored gates, Gigyu gets his chance to defy expectations and show the world that rank isn’t everything.

title: True Education
summary:
Na Hwa-Jin’s teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you can’t get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.


---

title: After Improperly Licking a Dog, I Became a Billionaire
summary: Once a typical simp, Lin Xin’s life takes a drastic turn when he’s dumped and inherits a divine financial system—starting him off with a whopping trillion yuan! But there’s a twist: he can only spend this fortune on women. Stuck with this bizarre stipulation, Lin Xin is forced to navigate an unconventional and thrilling path to wealth and power, transforming from a mere simp to a legendary tycoon.

title: Haesi’s New Path
summary:
Haeru, who was gifted with the mysterious power to foresee the future, rejects her fate and flees. One day, a peculiar scholar appears before her! A man who constantly gets lost, tells lies, and insists that fighting is done with the mind, not the body. From the moment she meets him, Haeru's halted fate begins to move again.
In 15th century Joseon, a sweet yet dangerous tale of love and war unfolds between the greatest genius king, untold by history, and a mysterious woman bound by the chains of destiny!

title: If You Desire to Keep Me [Official]
summary: Kisa’s world shatters when she hears her fiancé Daniel has another woman. She confronts him, expecting denial but Daniel doesn’t just lie; he mocks her, calling her stupid. Betrayed and trapped by her father’s refusal to let her break the engagement, Kisa’s fate feels sealed until Seyodd, the new duke and her late brother’s replacement, steps into her life. A secret contract marriage with him becomes her only escape. Just when she thinks she’s found freedom, a chilling letter from Daniel warns her about Seyodd’s dangerous secret. What darkness is Seyodd hiding beneath his noble mask?

title: Divorce Is Easy, But Love Is Hard
summary:
Ji Sina, a senior attorney at K Law Firm, is full of ambition. In order to proudly inherit her father's law firm in the future, she went through a difficult road and finally sat down as a partner lawyer, but she was then told that a guy like a horse snatched the position, the same one which had witnessed her dark history from her 20's, Sina, who is nice and kind to everyone, only has one man she can never get close to, and the person in all of these positions is Ryu Kang Hyun. Seduce such a person and say that you will inherit the law firm only if you succeed in marriage?

"I have a lot of divorce experience, but I don't know much about dating!"

The romance between Sina, an ambitious woman who doesn't know where to go, and Kang-hyun, a senior who doesn't know what's going on, begins.

---
[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6312288)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9608891), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=808201)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/lihunrongyilianainan/list?title_no=2438)

title: A Campus Romance, I Guess
summary:
An ordinary university student, Hayoon. She meets Kang-on on a trip for which she leaves on impulse. 

Kang-on falls in love at first sight with Hayoon and confesses to her but she rejects him. The two who thought they would never see each other again are reunited during a university club recruitment event...and end up joining the same club. But wait..the president of the club they joined likes Hayoon too?!

Lol this isn't made up but really just a campus romance...I guess.

title: Bad Ending Maker
summary:
“Please write your resignation, Mr. Mincheol.” 

Mincheol’s game Wings Online is going to be ruined for the sake of profit! But the new General Director has forgotten one thing: Mincheol knows every nook and cranny of his virtual world.

Together with his trusty AI sidekick Oasis, will Mincheol be able to enact his revenge and create a Bad Ending for Wings Online’s season 6 update?

title: I Reincarnated As The Crazed Heir
summary:
Once a rising martial arts master, Jagak Yang is known as the Ten Strike Finisher due to his ability to defeat any opponent within ten moves. Jagak is also the son of the leader of the Great Martial Alliance, an organization of virtuous martial arts sects. His future leadership over the martial arts world seems all but assured -- that is, until he is assassinated by jealous rivals! Jagak is reincarnated into the body of Cheonso Ma, the playboy second-in-command of the evil Shining Light Cult. Can Jagak remain true to his principles despite his new life on the dark side?

---

**Links:**
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/reincarnated-as-an-unruly-heir/list?title_no=3308)

title: Hold Her Tighter So She Wouldn’t Run Away
summary: After three failed marriages, Archduke Theo de Phoenix has long accepted that love simply isn’t in the cards for him. After all, who could love a war-hardened monster like him? So when his fourth bride arrives, he greets her covered in blood, gives her a shabby attic for a room, and keeps his distance. Surely, this one will run too. But Yuelina is not like the others. To Theo’s disbelief, she welcomes his presence and fills his cold world with warmth and light. As the walls around his heart begin to thaw, will Theo finally allow himself to love?

title: The Fate of the Perennial Sub Male Lead Is in My Hands
Invincible After Shocking My Empress Wife
summary: Ning Tian came to the Tianxuan World as a good-for-nothing but he somehow managed to get into the Empress’s bedroom and the extremely beautiful Empress Luo planned to marry him tonight?! Shocked! System activated! He can earn rewards by shocking others?! The beginning shocked the Empress and that was the first step for him to achieve his goal of shocking the whole world! Ning Tian looked at the countless prodigies and said, “No way… I was only cultivating casually and you guys are shocked by that already?

title: Shane’s Knight
summary: Ichinose Haruma is handsome, but the girl he likes happens to be even more handsome…?!
